questions.question: What is capital of South Korea?

messages.60: You FAILED! Time to start looking at a globe.
messages.70: You didn't quite fail... but you didn't quite pass. But, who needs to know their capitals anyway?
messages.80: You passed! That's better than I could do!
messages.90: Look at you! Someone remembers a thing or two about geography.
messages.100: WOW! You must be a traveler... or you have a great memory!
